283540.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Karugamo Fantasy BGM Pack 08
283540.description:
Let your fantasy take flight with the eighth selection of music tracks!

Karugamo Fantasy BGM 08 brings you more and expands on the ever popular staples of video game music with a focus on mystical, upbeat, peaceful and serene: mystical, positive, fun / whimsical, suspense, dramatic, medieval, contemplative solo piano and harp pieces, and cut-scene/event. Whether you're on the lookout for the perfect theme for your epic saga or simply in need of creative music to listen to while you map, you can't go wrong with Karugamo Fantasy!

Features:

  • 24 BGM themes, in OGG and M4A formats.
  • Instruments and composition styles you would find in many JRPGs
  • Royalty-free music you can use in your RPG Maker VX Ace games
